cards.description: [ACTIVATED] Return this card to the hand then Deal 30 damage to a Champion. [TRIGGER] When this card is equipped: Return 1 'Zodiac' card from your Field to Hand.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy this card then Heal 20 damage from a Champion. [TRIGGER] When this card is equipped: you can Add 1 'Zodiac' card from Grave to Hand.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy this card then Deal 20 damage to a Champion. [TRIGGER] When this card is equipped: you can Add 1 'Zodiac' card from Deck to Hand.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy this card then Draw 2 cards. [TRIGGER] When this card is equipped: you can Equip 1 'Zodiac' card to a slot.
[ACTIVATED] Shuffle 1+ 'Weather Gun' cards from your Field or Grave into the Deck then Deal 20 damage to a Champion for each and Add 1 'Weather Gun' card from Deck to Hand.

[ACTIVATED] Destroy this card and Discard a Spell or a 'Weather Gun' Equipment then Draw 3 cards. [TRIGGER] If this card is destroyed: Shuffle it into the Deck then Add 1 'Weather Gun' card from Deck to Hand.

[ACTIVATED] Destroy all Equipment equipped to this Champion then if you destroyed 2 cards: Deal 40 damage to a Champion. [TRIGGER] If this card is destroyed: Shuffle it into the Deck then Add 1 'Weather Gun' card from Deck to Hand.

[ACTIVATED] Destroy all Equipment equipped to this Champion then Deal 10 damage to each enemy Champion. [TRIGGER] If this card is destroyed: Shuffle it into the Deck then Add 1 'Weather Gun' card from Deck to Hand.
[ACTIVATED] Apply the following effects based on the number of attached 'Rain' cards. 1+: Deal 10 damage to a Champion. 3+: Heal 10 damage from this Champion.
[ACTIVATED] If this card has 3 or more attached 'Rain' cards: Deal 10 damage to each enemy Champion. [PASSIVE] Cannot be destroyed.
[ACTIVATED] Apply the following effects based on the number of attached 'Rain' cards. 0-2: Add 1 'Rain' card from Grave to Hand. 3+ Deal 20 damage to a Champion.
[TRIGGER] When this card is destroyed: Attach it to your Water Equipment then if 2 or more cards were destroyed this turn Deal 20 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Equip a 'Cloud' Equipment from your Deck to this Slot and Attach this card to it.
[ACTIVATED] Return this card and all attached cards to Hand. [TRIGGER] When this card is equipped: Attach any number of cards from Hand to this card.
